source.2790a672:
def change_kr_title(x):
    dic ={
        '진':'Jin',
        '지민':'JIMIN',
        '정국':'Jung',
        '지민&정국':'JIMIN & Jung',
        '랩몬':'RM',
        '방탄로그':'bts',
        '랩몬스터':'RM',
        '제이홉':'jhope',
        '제이홉&지민':'jhope&jimin',
        '랩몬스터&제이홉':'RM&jhope',
        '슈가&지민':'suga&jimin',
        '방탄소년단':'bts',
        '슈가':'suga',
        '슈가&지민,':'suga&jimin',
        '진&제이홉':'jin&jhope',
        '뷔':'v',
        '밥':'eat',
        '김남준':"RM",
        'j':'jhope',
        "J":'jhope',
        'RAP':'RM',
        'Rap':'RM'

    }
    if x.strip() in dic.keys():
        return dic[x.strip()].upper()
    else:
        return x.strip().upper().replace('-','')
source.adb644c3:
def visualization_vlog_thumnails(vlogdf_image,member_name):
        
    path = f'./bts_thumbnails/bts_thumnails/'
    
    vlogdf_image_filter = vlogdf_image.loc[vlogdf_image.vlog_member ==member_name].reset_index(drop=True)
    IMAGELST =[path + x +'.jpg' for x in vlogdf_image_filter['id'].values]
    IMAGETITLE =vlogdf_image_filter['vlog_member'].values
    IMAGEDATE = vlogdf_image_filter['pub'].astype('str').str.split(' ').str[0].values
    
    COLNUM =2
    ROWNUM =len(IMAGELST)//COLNUM +1

    for row in range(ROWNUM):
        fig, axs = plt.subplots(1, COLNUM,figsize=(25,10))
        for col in range(COLNUM): 
            img_num = row * COLNUM +col
            if img_num >= len(IMAGELST):
                axs[col].set_title('',fontsize=15)
                axs[col].axis('off')
            else:

                im = Image.open(IMAGELST[img_num])
                img_name = IMAGEDATE[img_num] +' '+IMAGETITLE[img_num]
                axs[col].set_title(img_name,fontsize=25)
                axs[col].imshow(im)
                axs[col].axis('off')
                
        if row ==0:
            fig.suptitle(f"{member_name}'s Vlog Thumbnails",fontsize=30, y=1.07)
            
        plt.show()
